scripts.start-criaty: npm run start-firebase & nx serve criaty
scripts.start-blii: npm run start-firebase & nx serve blii
scripts.start-hello: npm run start-firebase & nx serve hello
scripts.build: npm run build-criaty & npm run build-blii & npm run build-firebase & npm run build-firebase-functions
scripts.build-criaty-serve: nx reset && npm run build-criaty && npx serve dist/apps/criaty
scripts.build-blii-serve: nx reset && npm run build-blii && npx serve dist/apps/blii
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-appbase && npm run publish-calendar && npm run publish-carousel && npm run publish-chart && npm run publish-chat && npm run publish-firebase && npm run publish-form && npm run publish-i18n && npm run publish-layout && npm run publish-payment && npm run publish-table && npm run publish-theme && npm run publish-ui && npm run publish-utils
scripts.publish-appbase: cd libs/appbase && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build appbase && cd dist/libs/appbase && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-calendar: cd libs/calendar && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build calendar && cd dist/libs/calendar && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-carousel: cd libs/carousel && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build carousel && cd dist/libs/carousel && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-chart: cd libs/chart && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build chart && cd dist/libs/chart && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-chat: cd libs/chat && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build chat && cd dist/libs/chat && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-firebase: cd libs/firebase && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build firebase && cd dist/libs/firebase && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-form: cd libs/form && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build form && cd dist/libs/form && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-i18n: cd libs/i18n && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build i18n && cd dist/libs/i18n && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-layout: cd libs/layout && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build layout && cd dist/libs/layout && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-payment: cd libs/payment && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build payment && cd dist/libs/payment && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-table: cd libs/table && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build table && cd dist/libs/table && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-theme: cd libs/theme && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build theme && cd dist/libs/theme && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-ui: cd libs/ui && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build ui && cd dist/libs/ui && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
scripts.publish-utils: cd libs/utils && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build utils && cd dist/libs/utils && npm publish --access public && cd ../../..
